project_details.readme_content:
# Custom WordPress-Based Website

## About
This repository contains a customized WordPress-based web project.
The project has been modified, configured, and maintained by Ramanpreet Singh
for learning, development, and deployment purposes.

## Key Features
- Custom theme configuration
- Plugin integration and setup
- UI/UX customization
- Performance optimization
- Security configuration

## Maintainer
Ramanpreet Singh
